---
title: "Donor Lexems"
---
This page contains various lexems borrowed from Arabic into the languages of Daghestan
```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(DT)
datatable(
  data = read_tsv("dagapt_donor_lexems.tsv")[,2:8],
  caption = "Table shows various lexems borrowed from Arabic, Persian and Turkic languages into the languages of Daghestan",
  filter = "top"
)
```
